Trigger.description: Trigger information for policies in domain.
Trigger.longDescription: This type shall contain definition of trigger values supported for policies in the domain.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Max.description: Max acceptable trigger limit value for the trigger.
Max.longDescription: This property shall contain max acceptable value of a policy trigger limit for this trigger.

Min.description: Min acceptable trigger limit value for the trigger.
Min.longDescription: This property shall contain min acceptable value of a policy trigger limit for this trigger.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

TriggerValues.description: For triggers with enumerated limits, this property contains list of available values.
TriggerValues.longDescription: This property shall contain a list of valid values which can be set as trigger limit, in case of triggers which use enumerated values rather than physical properties.

Unit.description: Unit for trigger limit of the trigger.
Unit.longDescription: This property shall contain unit in which trigger limits are expressed.

title: #NmTrigger.v1_0_0.Trigger
